- Nice sushi, but price has been increasing very rapidly
- In Jul 2023, Salmon Duo (10 piece salmon sushi) increased from $6 to $7.
- In Nov 2024, it has increased to $8.50.

Decent shop focusing on low cost operation and fast in fast out customers. Food was ok and nothing to shout about. Price was competitive vs other brands due to its operational model. Have to eat fast after takeaway to prevent the food from going bad in the hot and humid weather here in Singapore.

Bought a nice box of Salmon Sushi Fiesta Box and was enjoying it with my wife. However one of the Salmon Floral Sushi had a bone in it. Fortunately my wife took it out of her mouth and was not injured. See pictures
